changePassword.title: Change Password
changePassword.accountSpecificNote: Note: This will only change the password for the current account. If you have multiple accounts linked to this profile, other account passwords will not be affected.
changePassword.passwordRequirements: Password must meet system policy requirements (minimum length, complexity, etc.)
changePassword.externalLoginNote: This account is authenticated via an external provider. To change your password, please visit the provider's website:
changePassword.disabledByPolicy: Password change is currently disabled by system policy. Please contact your administrator.
